I once pretended to be a sports fan and told the cop I was on my way to a game.
My teeth hurt from not chewing my food properly, but I have to move my army to the new camp.

content.text: I like a lot of sports, but I especially love biking! It's so much fun to get out and explore on my bike.
I've never been much of a biker myself, but I can see why it's so popular. It must be really freeing to just go for a ride and enjoy the wind in your hair.
That's exactly it! It's a great way to clear your head and relax.
I also like sports that are more team-oriented. I played soccer in high school and it was a lot of fun to work together with my teammates to win games.
I like team sports too, but I'm not very good at them! I'm more of an individual athlete.
I can respect that. There's something to be said for being able to rely on yourself to win.
Exactly! And it's really satisfying to improve your skills and see yourself getting better.
That's true. I've been working on my tennis game lately and it's been really rewarding to see my progress.
That's awesome! I'm always impressed by people who are good at tennis. It's such a difficult sport.
Thanks! It's definitely a challenge, but it's a lot of fun too.
I'm sure it is. I'm just not sure I'm coordinated enough to play it!
You never know until you try!
Maybe I'll give it a shot sometime.
I'd love to see you play
